thread.title: BRIEF-Simon Property Group Says CEO David Simon's 2017 Total Compensation Was $4.8 Mln

title: BRIEF-Simon Property Group Says CEO David Simon's 2017 Total Compensation Was $4.8 Mln
text:
March 28, 2018 / 4:30 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Simon Property Group Says CEO David Simon's 2017 Total Compensation Was $4.8 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Simon Property Group Inc: 
* SIMON PROPERTY GROUP INC SAYS CHAIRMAN AND CEO DAVID SIMONâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $4.8 MILLION - SEC FILING 
* SIMON PROPERTY GROUP INC SAYS CHAIRMAN AND CEO DAVID SIMON'S FY 2016 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $13.2 MILLION WHICH INCLUDED $9.5 MILLION IN STOCK AWARDS Source text: ( bit.ly/2uu7eon ) Further company coverage:
